title: WTB or Trade for a T206 Chick Gandhil
author: The Nasty Nati

posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for a T206 Chick Gandhil
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

I gotta fixin' for a fixer. I'm stilling looking for a T206 Chick Gandhil in VG to VGEX (prefer SGC, but would take PSA or Beckett). Raw too, if no signs of creases or major staining. Willing to trade or buy in cash, checks, hugs, and paypal.

Thanks!
speed bump...anybody got a spare gandhil?
